Module Internship.Management.System

module Internship.Management.System

Module Description

The Internship Management System is a comprehensive Java application designed to streamline the internship placement process for educational institutions. The system facilitates interaction between students, company representatives, and career center staff through a console-based interface.

System Architecture

This module follows a layered architecture pattern with clear separation of concerns:

  • Presentation Layer - Console-based user interfaces in the boundary package
  • Business Layer - Application logic and workflow management in the controller package
  • Domain Layer - Business entities and data models in the entity package
  • Persistence Layer - Data storage and retrieval operations in the database package

Key Features

  • Multi-role authentication (Student, Company Representative, Staff)
  • Internship application and management system
  • Company registration and approval workflow
  • Application status tracking and withdrawal handling
  • Role-based access control and authorization

Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
boundary
User interface layer containing all console-based interaction classes. Includes main menu, student dashboard, company portal, and staff administration interfaces.
controller
Business logic layer handling application workflows, authentication, authorization, and data validation.
entity
Domain model layer containing all system entities including Student, CompanyRep, Internship, InternshipApplication, and WithdrawalRequest.
database
Data persistence layer for system storage, including repository interfaces and data access operations.
